item.title: Color Correction Specialist for Real Estate Footage - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Color Correction Specialist to assist us with color correcting/color grading footage from a real estate shoot. The main task will be to recover one specific shot that was taken outside on an overblown image and ensure the footage is useab                     le This role requires an expert understanding of color grading techniques and the ability to work with various color correction software. The ideal candidate must have a keen eye for detail, excellent communication skills, and a portfolio showcasing their past color correction work.

Relevant skills:
- Color grading
- Color correction software (e.g., DaVinci Resolve, Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Attention to detail
- Communication skills


Posted On: June 17, 2024 07:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States

item.title: Veterinarian content creation - video - Upwork
item.description:
We are an European eCommerce brand for dog feed supplements that focuses on specific issues (gut and microbiota issues).

We would like to have a few short videos about our brand and product explainer for our website (based on our story and products).

We are seeking a veterinarian, who would be open to collaborating with us for some video content used on our website, and social media (organic posting and ads).

The videos would be in English - native British is preferred.

Would you be open to a collaboration? Send me a message, and let's see what we can do together.

You do not need to have video editing skills - we can edit your raw videos.

Thank you.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$70.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 07:02 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Explainer Video, Dogs, Veterinary Medicine, English
Skills: Explainer Video, Dogs, Veterinary Medicine, English
Country: Slovenia
click to apply

item.title: Animated Video Creator for SAAS Product Release - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented animated video creator to help us create a captivating video for the release of our SaaS product. The video will serve as an introduction and demonstrate the key features and benefits of our product. The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio showcasing their expertise in creating engaging and visually appealing animated videos.

Example: https://x.com/Optimism/status/1800256837088145799

    Responsibilities:
    - Collaborate with our team to understand the product and target audience
    - Develop a storyboard and script that effectively communicates our message
    - Create high-quality animations and visual effects that align with our brand identity
    - Incorporate voiceover and sound effects to enhance the video's impact
    - Ensure timely delivery of the final video

    Skills required:
    - Proficiency in animation software such as Adobe After Effects or similar tools
    - Strong storytelling and visualization skills
    - Ability to create visually stunning and attention-grabbing animations
    - Experience with video editing and post-production techniques

We are looking for an expert-level animator who can bring our product to life and engage our target audience effectively.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 06:56 UTC
Category: Cartoons & Comics
Skills:Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Motion Graphics
Skills: Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Motion Graphics
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Videographer Needed for Medical/First Aid Product Videos and Long-Term Collaboration - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are a dynamic medical and first aid supply company, gearing up for several exciting brand launches. We're in search of a talented and experienced videographer who can create engaging and informative product videos. These videos will vary in length and complexity, including basic product showcases and in-depth product testing demonstrations.

Key Responsibilities:

Produce high-quality videos that clearly demonstrate the features and benefits of medical and first aid products.
Work closely with our marketing and product teams to ensure video content aligns with our overall brand messaging and launch strategies.

Adapt video styles and formats for different platforms and marketing campaigns, ensuring they resonate with our target audience in the healthcare and public safety sectors.
Manage video projects from conception to final delivery, ensuring all videos meet our quality standards and deadlines.
Requirements:

Proven experience in videography, with a strong portfolio in product videos, preferably in the healthcare, medical, or first aid sectors.
Expertise in video editing software and strong video editing skills.
Excellent communication and project management skills, able to work with a small team and limited resources.
Marketing acumen to ensure videos align with campaign goals and effectively communicate the unique selling points of medical products.
Benefits:

Opportunity to work with a growing company on a variety of exciting new products and brands in the medical and first aid industry.
Potential for a long-term partnership with regular video projects.
Flexibility to work remotely from anywhere in the world. For product demonstrations, we will courier products to your location.

To Apply:
Please submit your portfolio showcasing your experience with medical or first aid product videos and any relevant marketing campaigns. Include a brief statement about how you would approach creating videos for a medical supply company like ours.

We look forward to collaborating with a creative and strategic professional who can help elevate our products and brand presence through compelling video content!

Hourly Range: $50.00-$83.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 06:30 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Creative Direction, Ad Creative
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Creative Direction, Ad Creative
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: SaaS demonstration video - Upwork
item.description:
Hello there,

We're developing a SaaS solution. For this product I'm looking to have a short demonstration video produced. I'll deliver you the SaaS tool. From there I expect you to:
- Screen record the tool
- Talk about the tool and it functions
- Prefferably with your face on screen as well
- Edit the recording

For this:
- A high quality monitor (for a high resolution video) is a must
- Good English speaking skills is a must.

If this is something you are interested in doing all. Please leave an offer.

With the offer, attach a short (10 seconds, content doesn't matter) video being representative for the needed video. This way I can make a good choice.

I want to get working ASAP.

Hourly Range: $3.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 06:26 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MP4, Video Editing, Screencasting Video, Explainer Video
Skills: MP4, Video Editing, Screencasting Video, Explainer Video
Country: Netherlands
click to apply
